title: the "its just a game"/"its just >game mode<" excuse...GTFO League!
body:
I really am fucking sick of this excuse being passed around. Just got out of a loss where our mid Zoe would completely ignore towers, drop everything to chase every single kill. And despite me clearing both top and bottom towers and even having to help her take her own tower. she Still did nothing to help push

in the end she went 0/10 and just kept using "Its just a game" before running off to chase another kill and die again. 
I am sick of people using this damn fucking excuse. If you sign onto a competitive, objective oriented game, then refuse to actually push towers just so you can pretend this is a call of duty tdm...Get the fuck off the game. 
You arent wanted, or needed.

You dont sign up to play baseball, then say you ONLY came to toss the ball back and forth (and not actually play baseball...just play catch)
thats the same thing. You sign onto an objective based game that revolves taking towers to destroy the enemy nexus, Then just fuck around wanting to run around chasing kills. No interest in actually taking towers or winning.
Then turn around and use "hur its just a game" or "its just norms" or "its just ARAM" as some debate-ending victory response. 
Yeah, its a game, -A COMPETITIVE GAME- 
these are the same people who get mad at people like me who try and take towers because I wont help them spend the game ARAMing mid for kills. 

you want a casual game? Go play "go fish" or "checkers" 

You want to chase kills? Fine, FUCKING UNISTALL LEAGUE and go play an FPS. Go play CoD, Go play Halo. but GET THE FUCK OFF LEAGUE. YOU ARE NOT WANTED. 

I am so fucking sick of this NA Casual attitude on a competitive game.

Edit: Oh Look, My first Downvote. Someone apparently likes having all thier hard work and effort completely dismissed and invalidated by 3-4 little words.

you work hard to take dragons, you work hard to farm your levels and secure the kills needed to HELP YOU TAKE TOWERS. 
And one person throws ALL THAT AWAY and decides to throw the match. They turn to you and completely dismiss you, your hard work,your effort, your strategy with "bruh, its just a game/Its just norms" 
Yeah. Why actually try and win, why actually have a competitive game based around objectives. cuz "its just norms, bruh" 
and yet Riot says people arent allowed to give up? 
Using "its just Norms/game/Aram" is a COVER you use to comfort yourself when you have given up. 
So thanks for the downvote. Lets me know you enjoy having your hard work invalidated.
